question: The following text is for questions number 12 up to 18. Mrs. White is a teacher. She....( 1)... Geography and Math. At the moment ,she ..( 2) ...in front of the class. related_questions.question:
Change verb in the bracket being a right verb.    For example: My father (wash) his car twice a month.
My father (washes) his car twice a month.
(He)
1.Tio (sweep) his room every morning.

2.Andin (go) to school everyday.

3.I and my family (eat) three times a day.

4.My father (work) hard.

5.My uncles (visit) our home every month.

6.My little sister (sleep) soundly.

7.Tia and Nia (study) every night.

8.My mother (watch) Hercai drama.

9.My friends (come) to my birthday party.

10.Mrs. Mala (teach) English.​

dijawab please

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

1. Tio sweeps his room every morning.

2. Andin goes to school everyday.

3. I and my family eat three times a day.

4. My father works hard.

5. My uncles visit our home every month.

6. My little sister sleeps soundly.

7. Tia and Nia study every night.

8. My mother watches Hercai drama.

9. My friends come to my birthday party.

10. Mrs. Mala teaches English.

Semoga membantu ^_^

related_questions.question:
Make sentences with the words given    1. Seimpi -dance-traditional
 2.Mr.Handoko -teacher-kind
 3. Miss kirana -dancer-famous
 4. Jakarta-city-big
 5. I-boy-strong
 6.Farida-girl-slim
 7. We-stundent-Indonesia
 8. Borobudur-temple-famous
 9. Indonesia-country-big
 10. Wisnu-handsome-boy

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

1. Serimpi is one of the traditional dance from Yogyakarta.

2. Mr. Handoko is a kind teacher.

3. Mrs. Kirana is a famous dancer.

4. Jakarta is a big city.

5. I am a strong boy.

6. Farida is a slim girl.

7. We are Indonesian students / We are students from Indonesia

8. Borobudur is a famous temple.

9. Indonesia is a big country.

10. Wisnu is a handsome boy.
